vakarySlogan: Vakary, plan your vacations as you please!

landingPage.free: We organize your dream vacations for you, for free
landingPage.pref: Tell us your preferences, the city you wish to visit, and we will propose a customized itinerary for you
landingPage.mobile: With Vakary mobile, you can also follow your itinerary in real-time and much more!
landingPage.enjoy: Make the most out of your vacations!
landingPage.enjoy2: Whether you prefer a walk, monuments, restaurants, or anything else, we have what you need
landingPage.block3Text1: Vakary goes on an adventure with you!
landingPage.block3Text2: Vakary travels everywhere with you, thanks to our mobile app, you can follow your itinerary in real-time and geolocate. You can also find your friends with whom your itinerary is shared
landingPage.block3Text4: With our group feature, you can share your itineraries, track the location of your group members, and chat with them

mobilePage.title: Are you ready to travel and discover?
mobilePage.text1: VAKARY is a tool for creating personalized tourist itineraries thanks to the partner regions that feed our application
mobilePage.text2: The app offers a simple and quick form to generate a precise itinerary that will suit you best
mobilePage.text3: You will find a detailed description of the points of interest, with information on events, and the possibility to listen to an audio guide
mobilePage.text4: A group feature has been put in place to allow easy itinerary sharing when you travel with family or friends
mobilePage.text5: The app has a paid feature that allows you to have an itinerary worked by travel professionals, who will advise you on the best places to visit at the location where you are!
mobilePage.scan: Scan the QR code with your mobile device to download Vakary.

park.title: Parks & Gardens
park.desc: Discover the most beautiful parks and gardens in the region

webPage.title: Are you ready to travel and discover?
webPage.smartphone: VAKARY is also available on your smartphone!
webPage.hobbies: Tell us your hobbies and passions
webPage.enjoy: Enjoy your day with our personalized itinerary
webPage.QRCodeDownload: Download our app directly to try it out

resetPassword.linkPassword: Enter your email address and we will send you a link :
resetPassword.codeReceived: Enter the code you got by email :
